title: pArAdu pArttu
sahitya:
pArAdu pArttirundAl nenjak-kiLiyE paraman varuvAnaDi nenjak-kiLiyE


anupallavi

  pErAyiram pEshinum nenjak-kiLiyE perumAn oruvanaDi nenjak-kiLiyE


caraNam    nAma rUpattinilum nAnA mathangaLilum nAthan oLindiruppAn nenjak-kiLiyE
Om tat sat Om ena Odu kiLiyE avan oLiyAi varuvAnaDi nenjak-kiLiyE jnAnam konjum kiLiyE
